pages.text: The Teleport Pad is used to teleport to $(l:dimensions/miningdim)The Mining Dimension$(/c), and $(l:dimensions/otherdim)The Other$(/c) you need to shift right click with both an empty hand and off hand.$(br2)As a note, the $(l:dimensions/miningdim)The Mining Dimension$(/c) is disabled in the ATM6: To The Sky pack
